name: EmyLiveShow: S&M story
description:
You're a journalism student who runs a blog about all sorts of paranormal stuff! To write a new article you go to the town where real vampire streamers are rumoured to live! What could be more exciting than digging into the secrets of popular lewd-tubers?! Welcome to N city —​ the place where your investigation about vampire lewdtubers begins!​

EmyLiveShow: S&M story is an erotic visual novel with the mechanics of raising levels and the item system that open up new possibilities in the plot development.

  • Customize your character. Choose your skin color, body type and preferred pronouns! You will see your body in spicy first-person scenes
  • Explore a variable plot. The game has 5 different endings, you will have to work hard to achieve them all.
  • Form your sexual preferences. Depending on your choice, your sexual preferences can become dominant or submissive.
  • Have an unforgettable experience. Get to know the N city in all its glory and make new acquaintances.
  • And find the truth about streamer girls Emy and Nia!



EmyLiveShow is a popular V-tube project in which Emy and Nia are taking part. Previously you could only watch them on the streams, but in S&M Story you will have the opportunity to get to know them personally and do a lot of interesting things together.

The game reveals the topics of: LGBTQ+ friendly, latex, mistress, pet play, blood play, spanking, blindfolds, threesome, Group sex‎, BDSM, Psychosocial, Kink, Masochism, Sadism, Sadomasochism, Dominant, Submissive, Bondage, Discipline, Male dominance, Male submission, Female dominance, Female submission, Pegging, Dominatrix, Masturbation, Voyeurism, Sexual roles‎, Sex toys, Strap-on dildo, Foot fetish.
